summary: Completed testing of Railway Collection app's new Prototipo functionality and Backup/Restore system. Backend implementation is fully working with all new features. Frontend forms and backup system are working correctly, with intermittent data loading issues in locomotive list view.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 422 validation error instead of 404 for non-existent resources
minor_issues.impact: Expected behavior - API validates input before checking resource existence

integration_issues.issue: Intermittent loading issues - sometimes shows skeleton loaders instead of data
integration_issues.details: API calls are successful (200 status) but data rendering is inconsistent

issues: React hydration warnings in console for table structure

passed_tests: ✅ Prototipo fields in locomotive backend model (paint_scheme, registration_number, prototype_type)
✅ Locomotive CRUD operations with Prototipo fields
✅ Backup data structure validation (locomotives, rolling_stock, decoders, sound_projects)
✅ Backup page UI with download and restore options
✅ Backup download functionality triggers file download
✅ Locomotive form displays Prototipo section with 3 required fields
✅ Prototipo field labels and placeholders match requirements exactly
✅ Locomotive data exists in backend (Electrotren 252 with prototipo data confirmed)

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (UI components working, intermittent data loading issues)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix intermittent locomotive data loading issue in frontend - API calls are successful but data rendering is inconsistent, sometimes showing skeleton loaders instead of populated locomotive list
